cfg

Class BinaryAddInst

  • java.lang.Object
    • cfg.TACInst
      • cfg.BinaryInst
        • cfg.BinaryAddInst

  • public class BinaryAddInst
extends BinaryInst
    A class representing a three-address code binary integer addition instruction (BinaryAddInst). A binary add instruction consists of a destination variable a left source operand (inherited from BinaryInst) and a right source operand (inherited from BinaryInst). From TACInst it also inherits an opcode (BINADD).
    Author:
    Marc Corliss and Lori Pietraszek
